| HistoryText             = The team assembled by Howard Stark to kidnap [[Recorder 451 (Earth-616)|Recorder 451]] from the [[Greys]]' boss, which would eventually help Stark and his wife to get [[Arno Stark (Earth-616)|a child]].{{r|Iron Man Vol 5 10}}

Stark later reassembled the team in order to kill the boss of the Greys and force his thugs to abandon Earth in order to preserve the safety of Howard's child.{{r|Iron Man Vol 5 12}}
